page.title: 15POPULATION MOVEMENT,TELFORD
page.content: Of the{200 people}interviewed at {Telford Town Centre}and{Dawley Centre on 2 Fridays in June 1985 12% lived in{Little Dawley,}33% in{Dawley,}9.5% lived in{Brookside,}11% in{Stirchley, 16% in{Malinslee}and 3% lived in {Randlay.}Of these 28.5% have lived in the same house for{1-5 years,}30.5% for {6-10 years}& 41% for{11 and over. 29.5% of interviewees had previously lived in{Telford,}25% moving from{West {Midlands}and 40.5% from{Elsewhere. Their reasons for moving were 24% {family,}31%{work,}19%{housing,}2% {schools,}24%{other reasons.}We found 39% owned their{own houses,}35% lived in{T.D.C houses,}26% lived in{Wrekin {District Council houses.}We asked if they knew their{"Post Code",}70% did. {40%}of the people interviewed in {Dawley}lived in{W.D.C. houses; 45%}at the{Town Centre}were{owner occupiers.
